title: [Plat-Dia] Scrim Team looking for midlaner
body:
Hey there! 

So we have a scrim set for today in exactly 1 hour. 
Sadly our midlaner will, yet again, not be able to join us. 

Therefor we are looking for a replacement midlaner. In case it works out well, and you would like to too, we could talk about more of course. 

We are currently placed in the Sinn League division 3. 

Hmu if you are interested!

Cheers.
